let domain = String(Get('url')).split(".")[1]; function addOptions(url, baseUrl, options) { let j = { "Referer": baseUrl.replace(/,[\s\S]+\}/, "") }; if (!url.includes(domain)) { j.Referer = ""; } options = options || {}; options.headers = Object.assign(options.headers || {}, j); return options ? `${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}` : url; } function arrayToImg(arr, func, baseUrl, options) { let result = []; for (let item of arr) { let imgUrl = addOptions(item, baseUrl, options); let imgTag = ``; if (typeof func === "function") { imgTag = func(imgUrl); } result.push(imgTag); } return result.join("\n"); } function stringToImg(str, func, baseUrl, options) { let imgUrl = addOptions(str, baseUrl, options); let imgTag = ``; if (typeof func === "function") { imgTag = func(imgUrl); } return imgTag; } function load(urls) { for (i = 0; i < urls.length; i++) { if (!urls[i].includes("coco_keys.json")){ url = urls[i] + 'User_Activation.json'; } else { url = urls[i]; } let response = java.ajax(url); if (JSON.stringify(response).includes("qyyuapi") || JSON.stringify(response).includes("C_DATA")){ return [response, urls[i]]; } } throw "Error: æ‰€æœ‰é“¾æ¥ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥"; let urls = [ "plugins/common.js", "plugins/cocomanhua.js", "tools/babel_asttool.js", "tools/config.js", "tools/decode.js", "tools/decodeOb.js", "tools/usefulPlugins.js" ]; let jsBaseUrl = cache.get(`cache_js}`); if (!jsBaseUrl) { jsBaseUrl = load(jsBaseUrls)[1]; java.toast('\n\n' + jsBaseUrl); cache.put(`cache_js}`, jsBaseUrl); } function toAbsUrl(url) { return /^\.\/|^http|^content|^\/sdcard|^\/storage/.test(url) ? url : jsBaseUrl.concat(url); } function loadJS(urls) { let scripts = ""; for (let url of urls) { let absoluteUrl = toAbsUrl(url); let content = java.ajax(absoluteUrl); let scriptTag = script(content); scripts += scriptTag; } return scripts; } function script(content) { return ``; } let html = `${loadJS(urls)}`; return java.webView(html, Get('url'), "keys"); } function fetchRemoteKeys() { let remoteUrls = [ "https://raw.githubusercontents.com/xiaohan231/autoCI/cocokeys/coco_keys.json", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xiaohan231/autoCI/cocokeys/coco_keys.json", "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/xiaohan231/autoCI@cocokeys/coco_keys.json", ]; remoteKeys = load(remoteUrls)[0]; return remoteKeys; } if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { let DEBUG = 0; let local_keys = null; function base64Decode(base64) { return java.base64Decode(base64) + ""; } let aes = { keys: null, retryNum: 2, saveKeys: function (keysString) { try { this.keys = JSON.parse(keysString); let localKeys = cache.get(`cache_keysString_${Get('url')}`); if (localKeys !== keysString) { cache.put(`cache_keysString_${Get('url')}`, keysString); return true; } } catch (e) { java.log(keysString); java.log("âå¯†é’¥è§£æé”™è¯¯ï¼ï¼"); } }, _aesDecrypt: function (key, word) { return java.createSymmetricCrypto("aes/ecb/pkcs7padding", key).decryptStr(word) + ""; category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}

  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}

	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";

gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>
